caption.title: percentage germ tube formation of (A) Candida albicans (ATCC MYA-2876) and (B) C. dubliniensis (ATCC MYA-646) with 0.25, 0.5 and 1.0 mg/mL Cinnamomum verum leaf oil and chlorhexidine digluconate within 6 h test period with 2 h intervals. 0 mg/mL concentration indicates the negative control.
